casebody.data:
In the Matter of METER MAID INDUSTRIES, INC., et al., Bankrupt. NATIONAL INDUSTRIAL BANK OF MIAMI, Appellant, v. Edward H. LEVIN, as Trustee for Meter Maid Industries, Inc., et al., Appellee. No. 71-2532

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 17, 1971. *348Robert R. Frank, Frank, Strelkow & Marx, Miami Beach, Fla., for appellant. John L. Britton, Feibelman, Friedman, Britton & Stettin, Miami, Fla., for ap-pellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir., Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5 Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 430 F.2d 966.
